attributes.action: Include white people under racism protection.
attributes.additional_details: To protect everybody I. The country from racism legally. Laws must protect all citizen and not discriminate. Current racism laws are discriminating unfairly against white people.
attributes.background: Currently there are no laws protecting white people from racism from other races. Why are we the the only race it be is legal to discriminate against.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Discrimination or abuse on the grounds of race is already illegal. The laws apply in all cases and not to specified races. You can find out more here - 

https://www.equalityhumanrights.com/en/advice-and-guidance/race-discrimination
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you do, you'll need to use a real full name.
